dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's Mazhilis just approved that draft law on industrial hemp production.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's Mazhilis just approved that draft law on industrial hemp production.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The corresponding draft law was approved by the Mazhilis today in its first reading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, in its first reading today. Deputy Nikita Shatalov had some serious concerns, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, in its first reading today. Deputy Nikita Shatalov had some serious concerns, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The corresponding draft law was approved by the Mazhilis today in its first reading. During the discussion of the amendments, Mazhilis deputy Nikita Shatalov asked how the Ministry of Internal Affairs would monitor the circulation of industrial hemp and whether its cultivation might lead to the emergence of a new, cheap drug.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he asked the Ministry of Internal Affairs how they'd monitor it all, and whether it could lead to a new cheap drug.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he asked the Ministry of Internal Affairs how they'd monitor it all, and whether it could lead to a new cheap drug.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the discussion of the amendments, Mazhilis deputy Nikita Shatalov asked how the Ministry of Internal Affairs would monitor the circulation of industrial hemp and whether its cultivation might lead to the emergence of a new, cheap drug.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the acting minister, Sanzhar Adilov, uh, he was pretty clearâ€”the Ministry will oversee everything from production to final distribution.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the acting minister, Sanzhar Adilov, uh, he was pretty clear-the Ministry will oversee everything from production to final distribution.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Acting Minister of Internal Affairs Sanzhar Adilov replied that the Ministry would oversee the entire process " from production to final distribution.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He really emphasized the distinction, like, industrial hemp has extremely low THC, genetically different from marijuana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He really emphasized the distinction, like, industrial hemp has extremely low T H C, genetically different from marijuana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It's important to clearly distinguish: industrial hemp contains extremely low amounts of the intoxicating substance tetrahydrocannabinol (THC). Genetically, it is different from marijuana (...)

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Virtually no psychoactive components, he said. It's not about getting high; it's about industry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Virtually no psychoactive components, he said. It's not about getting high; it's about industry.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If we are talking about cultivation for industrial purposes, this type of hemp has no psychoactive components, Adilov said during the Mazhilis plenary session.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But then there was that follow-up question about whether this is partial legalization of cannabis.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then there was that follow-up question about whether this is partial legalization of cannabis.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a follow-up, it was clarified whether this might be seen as partial legalization of cannabis and what motivated the current amendments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Adilov explained it actually came from a government task on February 19th, during an investment council meeting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Adilov explained it actually came from a government task on February nineteenth, during an investment council meeting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Adilov, on February 19, during an investment council meeting, the government tasked the Ministry of Internal Affairs with developing legislative amendments to support the cannabis industry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So it's motivated by economic support, not, like, drug policy reform.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's motivated by economic support, not, like, drug policy reform.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Adilov, on February 19, during an investment council meeting, the government tasked the Ministry of Internal Affairs with developing legislative amendments to support the cannabis industry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he mentioned the Committee for Countering Drug Trafficking has already issued four licenses to entrepreneurs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he mentioned the Committee for Countering Drug Trafficking has already issued four licenses to entrepreneurs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Committee for Countering Drug Trafficking has issued four licenses to entrepreneurs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: With THC levels between 0.1% and 0.3%, which will be formalized later.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With T H C levels between zero point one percent and zero point three percent, which will be formalized later.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I should note that under the legal framework we are discussing, THC levels range from 0.1% to 0.3%. This will later be formalized through legal regulations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he stressed that this hemp would be of no interest to drug users or sellers. It's just not usable that way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he stressed that this hemp would be of no interest to drug users or sellers. It's just not usable that way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The police official stressed that such hemp would be of no interest to individuals who use or sell drugs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So it sounds like they're being super cautious with regulations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it sounds like they're being super cautious with regulations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, balancing economic opportunity with, um, strict oversight. Smart move, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, balancing economic opportunity with, um, strict oversight. Smart move, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Let's see how this develops after the second reading.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Let's see how this develops after the second reading.
